channel.title: The Swift Sweets
channel.description: RSS for new Swift libs, sweet and awesome!

item.title: apegroup-parallaxpagecontroller-ios
item.description: A page based scroll view with a configurable parallax effect. Useful for e.g. tutorial/onboarding scenes.

item.title: apegroup-slidabletabpagecontroller-ios
item.description: A slidable tab page controller written in Swift.

item.title: APESuperHUD
item.description: A simple way to display a HUD with a message or progress information in your application.

item.title: APEReactiveNetworking
item.description: A small networking lib based on ReactiveCocoa.

item.title: JSONX 1.0.0
item.description: Parse JSON data, simple, lightweight and without noise.

item.title: UIPheonix 1.0.0
item.description: When Chuck Norris develops an app, he uses UIPheonix!

item.title: MKBlockQueue 1.0.3
item.description: MKBlockQueue allows you to create a chain of blocks and execute them one after the other in a queue.

item.title: MessageBox-Concept 1.0.4
item.description: MessageBox is a simple concept for decoupling entities. Think of it as notifications but the opposite.
